refnamediv.refpurpose: internal script to bring up kernel components

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: _startklips brings up the Openswan kernel component. This involves loading any required modules, and in the case of KLIPS or MAST, attaching and configuring the ipsecX pseudo-devices in and attaching the pseudo-devices to the physical devices.

refsect1.title: HISTORY
refsect1.para: Man page written for the Linux FreeS/WAN project <http://www.freeswan.org/> by Michael Richardson. Original program by Henry Spencer.
